name: 13 Black Cat Bay
description:
You're a detective. Tasked with the objective of investigating a house: 13 Black Cat Bay. As the detective, it is your responsibility to figure out a variety of elements regarding the investigation. Such as...

  • Who was murdered?
  • Who was the culprit?
  • The motive of the murder?

Find all five clues, then you may exit the ominous murder scene. I hope you enjoy my project.
